title: Validators Lose Money due to Time to Aggregate in v0.11
body:
This is an issue to track a possible issue with #5123 that may affect attester rewards.

Logs from #5123 enabled E2E tests: 
```
time="2020-03-21 17:15:18" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=13 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=13
time="2020-03-21 17:15:19" level=info msg="Verified and saved pending attestations to pool" blockRoot=fea4e2aad8d1 pendingAttsCount=8 prefix=sync
time="2020-03-21 17:15:24" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0xb4903ff3... slot=14
time="2020-03-21 17:15:24" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=8 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=14
time="2020-03-21 17:15:25" level=info msg="Verified and saved pending attestations to pool" blockRoot=b4903ff38655 pendingAttsCount=4 prefix=sync
time="2020-03-21 17:15:30" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0xc52e97ca... slot=15
time="2020-03-21 17:15:30" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=9 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=15
time="2020-03-21 17:15:31" level=info msg="Verified and saved pending attestations to pool" blockRoot=c52e97ca2ecd pendingAttsCount=2 prefix=sync
time="2020-03-21 17:15:36" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0xed402d02... slot=16
time="2020-03-21 17:15:36" level=info msg="Starting next epoch" epoch=2 finalizedEpoch=0 justifiedEpoch=0 prefix=blockchain previousJustifiedEpoch=0
time="2020-03-21 17:15:36" level=info msg="Validator registry information" activeValidators=64 averageBalance="32.00131 ETH" prefix=blockchain totalValidators=64
time="2020-03-21 17:15:36" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=4 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=16
time="2020-03-21 17:15:42" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0xcacf97d6... slot=17
time="2020-03-21 17:15:42" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=2 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=17
time="2020-03-21 17:15:43" level=info msg="Verified and saved pending attestations to pool" blockRoot=cacf97d6c520 pendingAttsCount=4 prefix=sync
time="2020-03-21 17:15:54" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0x0d744095... slot=19
time="2020-03-21 17:15:54" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=5 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=19
time="2020-03-21 17:15:55" level=info msg="Verified and saved pending attestations to pool" blockRoot=0d7440950135 pendingAttsCount=7 prefix=sync
```

Normal logs without the feature flag:
```
time="2020-03-21 17:25:32" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=2 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=12
time="2020-03-21 17:25:38" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0xea55faa6... slot=13
time="2020-03-21 17:25:38" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=2 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=13
time="2020-03-21 17:25:44" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0xe30aa889... slot=14
time="2020-03-21 17:25:44" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=2 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=14
time="2020-03-21 17:25:50" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0xa1897ea5... slot=15
time="2020-03-21 17:25:50" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=2 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=15
time="2020-03-21 17:25:56" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0xc922e03e... slot=16
time="2020-03-21 17:25:56" level=info msg="Starting next epoch" epoch=2 finalizedEpoch=0 justifiedEpoch=0 prefix=blockchain previousJustifiedEpoch=0
time="2020-03-21 17:25:56" level=info msg="Validator registry information" activeValidators=64 averageBalance="32.00141 ETH" prefix=blockchain totalValidators=64
time="2020-03-21 17:25:56" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=2 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=16
time="2020-03-21 17:26:02" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0x82b0fbc6... slot=17
time="2020-03-21 17:26:02" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=2 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=17
time="2020-03-21 17:26:08" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0x736de597... slot=18
time="2020-03-21 17:26:08" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=2 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=18
time="2020-03-21 17:26:14" level=info msg="Executing state transition on block" prefix=blockchain root=0xa6c4f852... slot=19
time="2020-03-21 17:26:14" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=2 attesterSlashings=0 deposits=0 prefix=blockchain slot=19
```

In E2E 2 validators are punished in the first 2 epochs, possibly for late attestation inclusions or improper aggregation.
This is a bug due to the frequency of aggregation in the beacon node. In v0.11, it leads to more scenarios where validators lose money. Renaming for clarity.
Closing in favor of #5288, the new workflow outlined there will resolve outstanding aggregation issues. If it keeps popping up after that, we can revisit this issue.
